title: Microfabrication Laboratory
description: Basic processes involved in microfabrication; cleanroom protocol, oxidation, diffusion, photolithographic and etching processes, sputtering and evaporation, process development through experimentation, device testing. Each student will be part of a 4-6 person team that will fabricate a micro electronic device or photovoltaic device. 2 laboratories. Crosslisted as BMED/MATEÂ 435.
